headline: Show HN: Hacker News dark mode userstyle with legibility improvements
description:
I created a userstyle[1] to add "dark mode" to HN, along with some increased text sizes, white space, and line heights to improve legibility:

https://git.gioia.cloud/andrew/gists/src/branch/master/Userstyles/Hacker%20News%20Dark.css

The idea is to maintain the spirit of HN and to just make some modest enhancements[2]. Hope you can use it!

[1] https://github.com/openstyles/stylus

[2] Based on https://github.com/Poorchop/userstyles/tree/master/HackerNews-Dark
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 黑客新闻黑暗模式的用户风格与可读性改进
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 黑客新聞黑暗模式的用戶風格與可讀性改進

这个想法是为了保持HN的精神，只是做了一些适度的增强[2]。希望你能使用它！

[2] 基于https://github.com/Poorchop/userstyles/tree/master/HackerNews-Dark
